iti10:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti10:2.1: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding hate, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
iti10:2.2: By directly knowing and completely understanding hate, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.”
iti10:2.3: That is what the Buddha said.
